name: dragoncurse hit
script:
-- dragoncurseAff(matches[2])
if multimatches[2][2] ~= "sensitivity" or not wsys.def.deafness then
  wsys.affadd(multimatches[2][2], "dragon")
end
matches: A sudden sense of panic overtakes you as the draconic curse manifests, afflicting you with
^A sudden sense of panic overtakes you as the draconic curse manifests, afflicting you with (impatience|paralysis|sensitivity|asthma)\.$
